verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee \w by|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: thou art mine.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cover thee: \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt walk \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* burnt, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flames|strong="H3852"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* \w in|strong="H0784"\w* thee:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thy Saviour: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy atonement, \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Saba \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thee.

\w Since|strong="H0834"\w* thou becamest honourable \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, thou art \w glorious|strong="H3513"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w people|strong="H0120"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w*. \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* thee \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w west|strong="H4628"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*: \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w south|strong="H8486"\w*: \w Keep|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w back|strong="H0935"\w*: \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8034"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* calleth \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w I|strong="H8034"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, \w I|strong="H8034"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w Bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w assembled|strong="H0622"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tribes \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w*: \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*? \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w myself|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w*. \w Before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w*, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* saviour \w besides|strong="H1107"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w declared|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w made|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* among \w you|strong="H0859"\w*. \w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* beginning \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w work|strong="H6466"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w For|strong="H4616"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* bars, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* glorying \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w*, \w the|strong="H0589"\w* Creator \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w path|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mighty|strong="H5794"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

Who \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w strong|strong="H2428"\w*: \w they|strong="H1077"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H1077"\w* shall \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H6965"\w*: \w they|strong="H1077"\w* \w are|strong="H7393"\w* broken \w as|strong="H3318"\w* \w flax|strong="H6594"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w are|strong="H7393"\w* extinct.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w things|strong="H7223"\w*, \w and|strong="H0995"\w* \w look|strong="H0995"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w on|strong="H0995"\w* \w things|strong="H7223"\w* \w of|strong="H0995"\w* \w old|strong="H7223"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w things|strong="H2319"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w spring|strong="H6779"\w* \w forth|strong="H6779"\w*, verily \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w*: \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w desert|strong="H3452"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dragons \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ostriches|strong="H3284"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1323"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w desert|strong="H3452"\w*, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0972"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2098"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H2098"\w* \w I|strong="H2098"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w for|strong="H8416"\w* myself, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H8416"\w* shew forth \w my|strong="H5608"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* hast thou laboured about \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* offered \w me|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* ram \w of|strong="H2077"\w* thy holocaust, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* hast thou \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* thy victims: \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* caused thee \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* oblations, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w wearied|strong="H3021"\w* thee \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w incense|strong="H3828"\w*.

Thou hast \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w sweet|strong="H7070"\w* \w cane|strong="H7070"\w* \w with|strong="H2077"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* hast thou \w filled|strong="H7301"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H2077"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w of|strong="H2077"\w* thy victims. \w But|strong="H0389"\w* thou hast \w made|strong="H7301"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0389"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w with|strong="H2077"\w* thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, thou hast \w wearied|strong="H3021"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H2077"\w* thy \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w*, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* blot \w out|strong="H4229"\w* thy iniquities \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* own \w sake|strong="H4616"\w*, \w and|strong="H2142"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w Put|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H8199"\w* \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w*, \w and|strong="H0859"\w* \w let|strong="H2142"\w* \w us|strong="H5608"\w* \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* if thou hast any thing \w to|strong="H4616"\w* \w justify|strong="H6663"\w* thyself.

Thy brat \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* thy teachers \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w me|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* slaughter, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* reproach.
